issue.title: [C++][CI][Windows] Enable more features on the windows GHA build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7121](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7121). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Like `ARROW_GANDIVA: ON`, `ARROW_FLIGHT: ON`, `ARROW_PARQUET: ON`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7121?focusedCommentId=17010206) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
`[~kszucs]` this is a significant blind spot relative to Travis CI, can we fix this before releasing?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7121?focusedCommentId=17011036) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Seems like this is more about being able to leave Appveyor, right?

FWIW the R test job on Appveyor has parquet ON.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7121?focusedCommentId=17013763) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
`[~npr]` is right, it is more about being able to port appveyor builds to GHA. 

cc `[~kou]`

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7121?focusedCommentId=17259125) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
I don't think we want to port more AppVeyor builds to GHA. Should this issue be closed?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7121?focusedCommentId=17306384) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Closing as won't fix for now. Our GHA build queues are already long enough.
